p: We characterized TEB- and/or ITR-resistant isolates for their cyp51A gene, focusing on tandem repeat (TR) variation in the promoter region and point mutations in the coding gene commonly found to confer resistance. From representative samples, up to three single resistant colonies recovered from −80°C were subjected to a DNA extraction protocol ( 19). The full coding sequences of the cyp51A gene and the promoter region were screened by PCR amplification and subsequent sequencing as previously described ( 22, 23). The cyp51A sequence (GenBank accession number AF338659) was used as a reference to detect mutations.
